Sandro Petrovski

B.S.E. Computer Engineering

University of Michigan

Welcome! I'm Sandro, a third-year CE student at the University of Michigan with a passion for both software and hardware! From a young age I've always loved building things from the ground up and exploring new technologies. My main project is the TauPau Engineering organization where I'm working to more formally document projects for others to learn from as well! Feel free to have a look around at the things I've built. :)

Maize-Made Arcade

[Work in Progress]
Classic arcade cabinet built entirely in-house; custom PCB header to map the joystick/button inputs to virtual keypresses. Interface / games written in the GoDot game engine.

Hyperion

Command-line utility to easily generate LED animations for WS2812B-based LED strip lights using a bitmap image on a Raspberry Pi.

Fractal Visualizer

This program generates fractals based on the Mandelbrot set within the complex plane, featuring multiple color palettes and customizable window selection for fractal visualization.

Experience

2022 - Present

TauPau Engineering

Co-Founder

As a founder of TPE (website), I lead a team dedicated to promoting electronics and STEM education through open-source projects. My responsibilities includes both conceptualizing and executing these projects while also maintaining the website / writing extended documentation. The organization is still in its infancy but we hope to build up a large portfolio of multidiciplinary projects!

Summer 2024

Nippon Seiki International

Hardware Design Intern â€¢ Troy, MI

At NSI, I focused on cost reduction and process optimization. I designed and built an in-house flashing jig, saving ~85% per unit, and identified ~$20k in potential savings through a detailed value analysis. Additionally, I resolved supply chain delays by negotiating with third-party vendors, improving lead times for critical components. These projects enhanced my technical skills and provided valuable experience in cost management and engineering process improvements.
